### Info

replica of [RadminRpbParser](https://github.com/x-ViRKiS-x/RadminRpbParser) parser of proprietary format the database of domain users is stored

### Note

Downgraded to __C#__ __5__ syntax and __MSBuild__ __4.0__ to match the __ShareDevelop__ defaults

### See Also

 * [original article](https://habr.com/ru/articles/968896/)(in Russian)
